channel.title: Ranking/Highscores menu + Eating weapon when eat food
channel.description:
Is there anyway to make a menu and eveyrone that plays is in there and it shows there lvls from greatest to least. Is it possible to do that in a command instead of doing it manually like.. Lets say it says ur lvl 173 and ur lvl 180 u type like ::updateranking and ur rank on the menu goes to 180 or something. I checked tuts but i cant find anything. If someone can help me i would greatly appreciate it.
[b]Also whenever i eat food it always eats my weapon.. Cna some 1 help me fix that please. Thanks. [/b]
Thanks! ;D

item.title: Ranking/Highscores menu + Eating weapon when eat food
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

I looked but i cant find, could you give me a link to one please.

Read full topic

item.title: Ranking/Highscores menu + Eating weapon when eat food
item.dc:creator: @Fluxedaway Fluxedaway
item.description:
@Fluxedaway wrote:

About the food thing, on most servers you need to have a weapon equipped to eat food (I think this is to prevent No-itemers on pking sources)

Read full topic
